title: Dagli sbagli si impara
content: Ho comprato una scheda di 64gb dopo averne comprata una da 128gb. Quella da 64gb é molto piú veloce e, per la mia macchina fotografica Nikon B500, é perfetta... Archivia molte foto ed é molto veloce in scrittura con un prezzo realmente economico.

title: Ormai uso solo queste.
content: Testate un po tutte le marche ormai uso solo queste della samsung perché il rapporto qualità/prezzo è imbattibile. Per adesso non se ne è mai rotta una.

title: Near 1GB/s up and down!
content: The 1TB SSD drive has excellent performance. Using a short USB-C to USB-C connection it has a read speed of 1048MB/s and 973MB write speed. Fit and finish is typical SanDisk quality.

title: Very suitable for ps5
content: I received a small white shell with the official PS logo on the front, which looks very suitable for PS5. You can use it by plugging it into the front USB-C port without any additional operation.Advantages: High-speed transmission greatly saves waiting time. Easy to use: Plug it in and it can be used. PS4 games can be run directly, and PS5 games can only be stored as backups. Durable protection: IP65 dust and water resistance, drop resistance, and the shell is protected by soft rubber, which is very suitable for carrying.Disadvantages: PS5 games cannot be run directly. When you want to play, you need to copy them back to the built-in SSD to run them.The cables are relatively scarce, and they are connected to the front of the PS5, so they cannot be placed flat on the table.In summary, if you have enough budget and like the style consistent with the PS5, it is a good choice.

title: DO NOT BUY. DOES NOT PLAY GAMES
content: Absolutely nowhere does it say that it can't play games. Horrid advertising

title: Fast, Tough, and Ready for More PlayStation Storage!
content: I got this external SSD to give my PlayStation 5 some breathing room, and I appreciate how quickly it moves my games over. I transfer large titles in minutes, which helps me jump back into my game without extended wait times. The SSD integration is smooth and works AS DESIGNED for my console. I no longer remove older games to make space for new ones. Managing my library with the added 1 TB of storage is simpler, faster, more secure, and is now transportable.The build quality from SanDisk is solid, and I know from history with their products they can handle the inevitable bumps or drops without failing. Whether I move my system between rooms or take it with me when I travel, this drive holds up well. The extra storage lets me keep more of my favorite titles ready to load, and the SSD speed keeps everything running smoothly. Adding this SanDisk SSD right into my console setup makes my gaming faster, with less noticeable lag, and more realistic screen views. This upgrade was easy to implement and makes a real-time improvement to my PlayStation 5 gaming console.FIVE STARS! and HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!Thanks AMAZON!Mark in North Carolina

title: Works Very Well on M4 Mac Mini
content: I set this up as a Time Machine drive for an M4 Mac Mini. I reformatted using APFS. This is easily the fastest full back up that I've ever done. Minutes instead of hours. The form factor is good even if I am not using it for a PlayStation. The included USB-C cord is super short but that's not an issue for me.

title: A Game-Changer for PS5 Storage​
content: I recently upgraded my PS5 storage with this SSD, and it's been a fantastic addition. The setup was a breeze—plug it in via USB-C, and you're ready to go. With read speeds up to 1000MB/s, transferring and accessing games is quick and seamless. The design aligns perfectly with the PS5 aesthetic, and the rugged build gives me confidence in its durability.​While you can't play PS5 games directly from the external SSD, it's perfect for storing and transferring PS5 titles. For PS4 games, you can play directly from the drive, which is a nice bonus. The added benefit of a 1-month Discord Nitro trial is a thoughtful touch for gamers. Overall, this SSD has significantly enhanced my gaming experience by expanding storage without compromising performance.​

title: Crazy fast, compact drive
content: One use of this drive I had was to move several large (1 to 3gb) files between computers. I saw write speeds averaging between 400 to 500 mb per second. The drive is small and looks great. Plus, it’s a SandiskI, I have had really good experiences with their products. Overall, I am very happy with this drive.

title: Absolutely wonderful!
content: I love this little SSD. It's super small so it's very portable and it's incredibly fast. It uses USB-C and comes with a short cable for it. I also have a lot of trust for this brand from years of experience with em and I verified the serial on their website to ensure it was genuine. I gotta say though, the design is so cool, I love the color scheme on it, very PS5 themed. It also has a slightly rubbery texture on the outside which makes it not fall off surfaces too easily. Overall a great design and a wonderful portable SSD

title: Fast, Compact, and Actually Feels Durable
content: I have had portable SSDs before that felt like plastic toys, but this one is sturdy. It’s smaller than I imagined, but that’s a plus—it fits into my tech pouch easily. Speeds are excellent for what I’m using it for (mostly video editing files and game saves), and setup was instant on both my Mac and PS5. I dropped it once already (accidentally), and there’s no damage. The rubberized edge also helps with grip. Just a reliable storage option that travels well.

title: Good Build, Great Match for My Setup, but Not Full Speed
content: This 1TB external SSD feels really well built, and the compact size makes it easy to toss into my laptop bag without worrying about it. I really like the clean white color too — it matches my Legion 7i perfectly, which is a small thing but still makes the whole setup look more cohesive.Performance-wise, it’s solid, but I couldn’t quite hit the 1000 MB/s speeds they talk about, even using my laptop’s Thunderbolt 4 port. I topped out around 600 MB/s, which is still plenty fast for what I need, but worth noting if you’re chasing maximum numbers. Overall though, it’s a great drive for the price and fits nicely into my workflow.

title: USB 3.0? Nowhere near the potential top speed claimed. Suspect caching.
content: The packaging and included cabling are great, and the build quality of the SSD itself are not in question here. That is top notch. However, across many USB3.x ports and cables I found that under load the SSD never peaked past ~5gbps (~500MB/s) which leads me to believe this might just be a USB *3.0* device. My guess is that there may be some caching on a faster device elsewhere if used with a PS5, which is definitely dishonest when it comes to the rated speed because that top speed is going to depend on how full the cache is and whether you are hitting it.

title: Tam bir F/P Ürünü
content: 256 GB Hafızayı bu fiyata almak muazzam. Artık 64 GB da çekime yetecek mi derdi yok. Teşekkürler Amazon

title: New Life for Dell Inspiron 3521
content: I have a Dell Inspiron 3521 that is 8 years old. Although I perform most tasks on my phone, I like to keep a laptop computer around to perform certain tasks that require a lot of typing and for printing documents. It got to where it was running extremely slow and often freezing. I decided to upgrade it instead of buying a new computer in order to save money and extend the life of my current laptop.Upgrading to 16 GB of RAM, replacing the hard drive with a solid state drive, and a fresh install of windows has brought new life back to my old PC. This SSD is great value for the money. Perfect compatibility with the Dell Inspiron 3521 and easy to install.

title: Sencillo de instalar, reconocible al momento, eficiente, CALIDAD
content: compré uno y volví a repetir porqu sin duda funciona muy bien. Trae instrucciones muy claras, aunque ua de por si la instalación es sencilla. No requiere conocimientos avanzados de bada. Lo se ha utilizado para cambiar el disco duro en varios ordenadores portátiles y fijos y varias marcas sin excepción lo reconocen rápidamente simplemente con la instalación. han admitido la copia de datos sin ningún problema ninguno me ha salido defectuoso la velocidad de acceso es la que venden y la mejora de la velocidad del ordenador se nota instantáneamente. He repetido y repetiré con esta marca. TOTALM.ENTE RECOMENDABLE

title: Can't boot from either drive 👌🏻
content: Acronis True Image which crucial recommends sucks.It has somehow corrupted the boot drivers or boot configuration files of my Bios beyond repair. After one attempt at booting the cloned drive i got a BSOD and now I can't even boot my original drive. Cost me half a day and I still have no solution after rebuilding the boot files from the recovery partition. I might be forced to do a fresh installWould not recommend the cloning software and by extension crucial as they caused me this mess.

title: Taking the leap from HDD to SSD
content: Bought this to replace a 1TB hard drive. This is my first experience with SSD units for my desktop. I've been experiencing BSODs and random pauses, which may or may not have been the first signs of drive failure. And I know that mechanical hard drives will eventually fail, so time to move forward with the SSD. I've replaced root drives before, so the procedure wasn't very difficult; the software used by Crucial worked fine, but it does take a while to build up a drive image. You have to resist clicking on buttons or trying to exit it, thinking it's frozen up.Once I had copied the old drive onto the new one, it was just a matter of sorting out the cables to unplug the old drive. It used to take upwards of several minutes to boot and then I had 100% drive usage for ten minutes or more while the antivirus and other stuff load and sort themselves out. The desktop now boots up much faster and I'm ready to go within two minutes of hitting the power button. I plan on eventually replacing my second 1TB drive with another SSD at some point.I also can't believe how physically small this drive is; I've spent years working with disk drives and expected this to be of a similar size. But it's tiny! I guess I'm just getting old.

title: Top SSD für kleines Geld – einfach, schnell und zuverlässig
content: Ich habe die Crucial BX500 1TB SATA SSD als Zusatz für meinen PC gekauft und das Ergebnis hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen.

title: Simple, affordable, good quality.
content: Affordable little SSD with a lot of power and capacity! It's fairly easy to set up, you can just search up how to install something like this most of the time. I've found its heavily sped up the speed at which my pc loads games, videos, all sorts! Really happy with it.

title: PAS SATISFAIT DU TOUT
content: Produit défectueux après une semaine Écran bleu et messages d'erreurs disques. Impossible de le reformater. Des DATAs personnelles sont sur le disque. Donc je ne peux le rendre. Perte sèche. Pas de solution de la part d'Amazon qui réclame le disque en état et du constructeur Crucial pour effacer les données.Je mets une étoile non méritée car sinon je ne peux pas poster le message.

title: Rent skräp!!!
content: Absolut det sämsta köpet jag någonsin gjort. Dom var bra i ca 1 månad, sen blev dom helt plötsligt värdelösa. Jag köpte dessutom 2 av dessa, och båda blev typ samtidigt dåliga. Skriv och läshastighet på runt 12-10 mb/s och ibland till och med lägre. Slutade med att jag fick köpa helt nya hårdiskar och tog mig flera dagar att föra över all data till dom ny hårdiskarna. Fattar inte hur dom ens kan tillverkat nåt så uruselt och dåligt, och att dom fortfarande säljs? Önskar jag hade försökt få pengarna tillbaka :/

title: Leider kaputt angekommen, super Abwicklung.

title: Value
content: Value

title: El sistema se congela aleatoriamente.
content: De primeras parece funcionar bien, aunque estoy teniendo unos inconvenientes.Funcionar funciona, pero desde que le instale el sistema se queda bloqueado de manera aleatoria.Desde quedarse pillado simplemente en el menú de ajustes, pillado en el escritorio, hasta en mitad de un juego o editando Excel.Para descartar lo he formateado y reinstalado nuevamente el sistema, incluso he vuelto a mi ssd antiguo y no hay ningun problema con mi viejo ssd, es lento. Es mucho mas viejo, pero no se bloquea.Despues de formatear la unidad y reinstalar nuevamente el problema persiste, me temo que es algun problema de la unidad por que no es normal que simplemente navegando por YouTube se quede congelado el sistema sin reaccionar.Probaré, y si se soluciona o no, editaré la reseña pero por el momento no puedo recomendar este producto, y si el problema persiste será una pérdida de tiempo y una devolucion.
